headline: Mike Gibbons takes lead in Republican race for Ohio seat
author: Kate Scanlon
sentences: Ohio’s crowded Republican Senate primary is still 2 1/2 months away, but one candidate has made gains in recent weeks: businessman Mike Gibbons.
Ohio’s crowded Republican Senate primary is still 2 1/2 months away, but one candidate has made gains in recent weeks: businessman Mike Gibbons.
A February poll by the Trafalgar Group found Josh Mandel as an early front-runner in the primary race to replace retiring GOP Ohio Sen.

Comments:
There's only one thing that matters in this race - who has the best chance to win in the general election in November?
But it found Gibbons at 16.4%, an increase from 11.9% in December, marking a jump from third to second place in just two months.
I don't care if it's Gibbons, Vance or Timkens, they have to win, or our country is in trouble.
Rob Portman, with the winner expected to face Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan in November.
